emuInput.TitMainTitle: James Strothers, seated next to birthday cake, surrounded by family members, left to right: Cobren Atkinson, William Brim, Mrs. B.R.Hairston, Carolyn Atkinson, Willie Brim, Mary Brim, daughter, Rev. J.C. Hairston, and Estelle Harrell, gathered in Sixth Mt. Zion Baptist Church for 100th birthday party
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 6, 1961, pg. 16 reads: "Centenarian - James Strothers, faithful member of Sixth Mt. Zion Baptist Church, Pittsburgh, celebrated his 100th birthday on April 23 by attending Sunday school in his usual way. He has been a member of Sixth Mt. Zion since 1945.  Mr. Strothers was born at Criglyville, Va., in 1861.  He came to Pittsburgh in 1887 and joined the Mt. Ararat Baptist Church in 1915.  He has one daughter, Mrs. Mary  Brim, and seven grandchildren and 11 great-grandchildren.  Left to right: Cobren Atkinson, great-granddaughter; William Brim, grandson; Carolyn Atkinson, granddaughter; Willie Brim, son-in-law; Mrs. Brim, daughter; Mrs. B.R.Hairston (rear), Sunday school superintendent; Rev. J.C. Hairston, pastor; Mrs. Estelle Harrell and Mr. Strothers, seated. - Harris Photo."
